Convert 15%+ of organic traffic to qualified leads
Capture 5% market share within 18 months ($15M potential market)
Achieve $2M ARR by end of Year 2
Build sustainable competitive moat through content authority and premium positioning

Decode hidden language of hiring algorithms
Transform resume match rates from 35% to 85%+
ATS Mastery: Proprietary engine reverse-engineered from leading ATS platforms
Company Intelligence: Deep-dive research reports and insider interview questions
Success Analytics: Track entire job search journey with precision
